doc.field: - Cheyenne Software Inc said it is in preliminary talks on the acquisition of compouter hardware distribution firm F.A. Components Inc and its Freeman-Owings Inc subsidiary. The company said F.A. had sales of 43.1 mln dlrs for 1986 and expects to report a loss for the year. Cheyenne said the purchase price would be paid in common stock and it would provide additional finances for the operation of F.A.
